WorkItem.ClosedComment: User is either misinformed about what part of the interface he's looking at or he needs to put more info up. Closing as not actionable due to lack of info
WorkItem.Description:
I used optimizer tonight - it's telling me that I need a bunch of gear reforged to hit.  My in-game stats tell me that i have 884 hit rating (.64% to miss).
 
Rawr is telling me that I have 884 hit rating, but 8.x% chance to miss, and that I need another 850+ hit rating to cap.  
 
That can't be correct.
 
I cannot get accurrate optimze info when rawr isn't calculating hit correctly.  Am I missing something?

Comments.Message: Please follow the bug reporting guidelines; we're simply unable to help you with what you've given us. We'd love to help you, but you haven't even posted a character file.
The hit cap is 1742, not 8xx-9xx; if you're seeing 0.64% chance to miss it's because you're looking at melee or ranged hit chance, not spell hit
